# Start-up
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(igraph)
library(here)
```

# load data
```{r}
prior <- read_delim(here(
  "data",
  "ccc",
  "gene_mania_prior",
  "COMBINED.DEFAULT_NETWORKS.BP_COMBINING.txt"))

meta <- read_delim(here(
  "data",
  "ccc",
  "gene_mania_prior",
  "COMBINATION_WEIGHTS.DEFAULT_NETWORKS.BP_COMBINING.txt"))
```
